name: Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3-e - Doors o' Plenty
summary: Doors o' Plenty is an e-Reader level for Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3. The level contains five Advance Coins and the Super Leaf e-Coin. Its official difficulty rating is of four out of five stars. This card was released as part of series 1 in Japan and North America.
